inn1.comm: good length, a slow ball to start off, smack on off stump and Ganguly is early into his defensive shot
slow ball again, a touch fuller outside off stump and Ganguly pushes into the covers
not working up any pace at all, just 135ks and its very, very wide of off stumps for India's first run
dobbler outside off stump, pitching on a length and wobbling off the seam, Ganguly is beaten, the ball dies on Gilchrist and evades him and first slip

oh thats just plain ridiculous! Lee bangs in a short ball on middle and leg, Ganguly gets up and plays it down into the midwicket region and sets off, Hodge swoops across, Tendulkar comes down a few steps and says go back, but Ganguly's halfway down the track and cant get back to his crease and Gilchrist just has to take an easy return over the stumps and whip off the bails

thats plumb! Dravid goes for a first-ball duck! Lee pitches full on middle and off and gets the ball to swing on, Dravid tries to play it back straight while hopping back, gets stuck in the crease and is caught dead in front of leg! The ball stayed a touch low but thats out anywhere in the world
short of a length outside off stump, well left alone
full outside off stump, Tendulkar eases into a push to cover
back of a length on middle and off, sits up and Tendulkar hops, shuffles and defends it back to Johnson
good length on middle and leg, turned well but right to square leg
fuller now, getting it to move in, Tendulkar works it from off stump to that man at square leg again, failing to beat the field
overpitched outside off stump, Tendulkar shimmies forward and threads the gap between the covers for the first boundary off the bat, thats a nice shot
checks his length now, holding it back and the ball stops on Tendulkar, already into his shot, and he checks it watchfully to mid-off
pitched full and wide, allowing Yuvraj to get off the mark with a free-flowing drive backward of point for one
good length, pitching outside and going away slightly as Tendulkar judges the length and bounce and leaves it comfortably
a touch fuller outside off stump and now Tendulkar comes forward and defends it carefully into the covers
awkward bounce! Lee bowls this one full and much slower and it pitches and basically rolls past Tendulkar, leaving off the front foot, to Gilchrist
effort ball from Lee, pitching short and lifting past Tendulkar's shoulders as he drops the bat and lets it pass ... a slow ball but good carry from Lee
fuller length, very wide of off stump and moving away .. and its called wide
top ball! Full and moving away, luring Tendulkar into a half-hearted drive, lunging the front foot out and missing the line of the ball completely, good swing from Lee
back of a length, wide of off stump, Yuvraj leaves it and the ball carries low to Gilchrist behind the stumps again ... batting not easy out there
fuller length, not there to be driven and so Yuvraj gets forward quickly and defends to point, 'WAIT' is his call to Tendulkar
full and wide, Yuvraj square-drives to backward point where Clarke misfields, but the batsman dont chance his arm given what happened in the opening over
tight delivery, hitting the right areas and moving in ever so slightly, Yuvraj hurriedly gets behind the line and defends back to Johnson
back of a length this time, moving away wide of off stump and Yuvraj stands and flirts, connecting with nothing but air, wide is the call

edged and well taken! Johnson bowls another short delivery, it sits up and Yuvraj stands leaden-footed as he goes for an airy shot outside off stump, theres the thinnest of under-edges which Gilchrist holds very low above the ground! An especially good take because Gilchrist was moving to his left initially but then had to adjust as the ball deviated to his right, plucking it one-handed very low. India jolted by three quick strikes
good length, on the stumps, hurriedly defends to cover
full and wide, moves away sharply and the umpire spreads his wings
good length, pitching and moving away but Tendulkar gets over it and defends to point
gentle delivery drifts down leg stump and Tendulkar turns it off the pads backward of square and calls for two immediately
fullish length outside off, moving away after pitching, Tendulkar leaves it
lovely seam position from Lee! Pitches on a great length on off stump and curls away at a good pace and height from Tendulkar, squaring him up as he turns and faces midwicket ... great delivery
short delivery again, moving into Tendulkar and catching him near the midriff area well above the stumps, ball rolls away and they run a quick single
back of a length on middle and off, Uthappa gets forward, adjusts himself, and tucks it straight to midwicket
full delivery angled across Tendulkar, who gets forward and defends with an inside-edge back to Johnson
full again, a touch wider, Tendulkar eases forward and drives straight to mid-off
thats four, Johnson drifting down leg stump and the ball clips Tendulkar's back leg and runs away fine for leg-byes
all timing! Tendulkar shuffles and wristily works a full delivery from off through the wide open spaces at midwicket and the ball races away across the turf
good length this time on off stump, Tendulkar gets behind the line of the ball and plays it back to Johnson
fuller and slower, Tendulkar eases forward and times his drive well but cant beat Symonds at extra cover
angled on middle and leg stump off a length and Uthappa tucks it off the pads for four down to fine leg, no fielders there so thats an easy four
fullish outside off stump, Uthappa greets it coming forward and timing a good drive but Symonds intercepts in the covers
pitches on leg stump, slower, Uthappa drops it in front of midwicket and calls Tendulkar for the quick single
good length, well wide of off stump, Tendulkar leaves it alone
good length again, outside off, not very quick and Tendulkar leaves it

sweet! Lee just overpitches a touch and with the pitch not assisting any real quick bowling Tendulkar can just lean into a textbook-perfect drive through extra cover .. all timing and the placement was perfect ... Tendulkar stands and admires the shot

another one bites the dust! Johnson pitches it back of a length, Uthappa gets a stride forward from his crease and plays, but misses, and the ball raps him on the pads as it angles across off stump, and even before Johnson and Gilchrist finish appealing umpire Sahiba's finger shoots up ... an iffy call, as it looked like the ball was going outside the line of impact. And the height is an issue.
and he's greeted by a short delivery on off stump, sitting up and he takes his eyes off it, luckily for him he plays it down in front of the stumps
short of a length outside off stump, cut into the point region off the back foot
back of a length just outside off, cramped for room but he goes for the cut, the ball stays low and Dhoni escapes with a fine-cut to fine leg
fuller length, Dhoni gets forward and drives on the rise, the ball again stops on him as he plays it to extra cover
wide of off stump, it goes past Dhoni and dies on Gilchrist again, further indication of the nature of this pitch
pitches full and wide and moves away, Tendulkar gets his front foot forward and then allows it to pass safely, ball again not carrying to Gilchrist
moves down leg stump and Tendulkar misses out on the glide off the pads, another sign that this pitch is slow and low ... he doesnt miss that shot much
good length on leg stump, worked straight to midwicket
slower delivery, full outside off, Tendulkar gets a good stride forward and leaves and Gilchrist collects on the third bounce ... very poor carry
full and this time Tendulkar goes through with the push into the covers but cant beat Symonds out there
back of a length, doesnt sit up all that much and Tendulkar gets onto the back foot, punching well past point for four
quicker ball, a bit fuller now outside off stump and Tendulkar leaves well enough alone
back of a length outside off, again stopping on Dhoni as he plays away from his body and has to wait on the shot, then tapping it to point
good length, angled across Dhoni well wide of off stump, he backs away and thinks about crashing it away but holds back, wisely

and the captain goes! Johnson bowls it down the leg side off a short length, angling it away from the right-hander and Dhoni goes for some sort of one-handed nudge off the pads, there's touch and deviation and Gilchrist takes another good catch, this time diving full length to his left and plucking it ... are India in trouble or what?
back of a length outside off stump, going away, Pathan shoulders arms
back of a length on middle and off, he gets behind the line of the ball and defends well back to Johnson
outswinger outside off, well left alone
good ball, pitching on a good length and beating the outside edge of Pathan's bat as he stands and feels for it
pushed close on the off side, full ball from Hogg
tossed up, Tendulkar down the ground and pushing to mid-on, straight to the fielder, though
good change of pace that time, wrong 'un too, defended cautiously
whipped away from middle to the leg side, fielder in quickly
turned in the gap for a single this time
tossed up, drawing Pathan forward, pushed srraight
Outside off, opened the face and angled it past the wicketkeeper for four
slower one this time, 115kph, Tendulkar beaten by lack of pace, tries to angle again but beaten
pushed to the off side but straight to the fielder
full and straight, eye-pleasing straight-drive that motors past the bowler but some fine fielding by Nathan Bracken at mid-on, diving to his left and keeping them to only one
short of a length, tapped to the off side
good-length ball this time, glided away to the off side
a warm welcome from Tendulkar, slightly wide and Tendulkar cracks it on the rise to the cover fence for four
driven to extra-cover
straight this time, he's been tough to get away when he's accurate, Tendulkar pushes to mid-on
full and looks for some swing but Tendulkar responds in style, extending his front-foot and crashing a glorious straight-drive for a sizzling four
pushed to mid-on
worked away to point
full and a shade of swing, nervous push to point
left alone outside off, hint of swing again
some movement again, Pathan shoulders arms. It's his homeground, of course. Lots of banners celebrating him.
full and outside off again, left alone

huge appeal for lbw, full and strikes Pathan on the front pad, he tries to push forward but umpire Sahiba turns it down. He seems to think there was an inside edge but that might have struck him outside the line as well
outside off, not much bounce again, left alone by Tendulkar
full and slightly wide, sublime stroke from Tendulkar, caresses it past cover for a most gorgeous four
tapped away to the off side
pushed tentatively to cover, no run again
straight and accurate, short of a length, defended off the back foot
pushed cautiously to mid-on
Irfan duly tries to steer it past the only slip but can't get the single
sull and swinging, Bracken still managing to do something with the ball, Pathan drives on the up, straight to the cover fielder
soft pat to the off side, short of a length and Pathan keeps it out watchfully
short of a length again, Bracken mixing his lengths well, outside off and left alone
Pathan off the mark in his 18th ball, thick outside edge past slip to third man for four. Local boy is on his way. Brother Yusuf smiles in the crowd
left alone outside off, normal service resumes
outside off, left alone again. India's batsmen have decided to shoulder arms when given the chance. Sensible when half the side is back in the hutch
you guessed it, good length ball, outside off and thanks but no thanks
tapped to mid-on, tamely, softly, tentatively
on the back foot, pushed confidently to cover
dabbed through cover for a single
full and on off, pushed to the off side
back of a length delivery, angling across off, Tendulkar waits for it and then gently drops the soft hands on it to run down to third man
back of a length just outside off, no room to work with whatsoever, Pathan gets in line and defends from the crease
back of a length wider of off stump, and Pathan leaves it be
pitches full and Pathan comes forward, unveiling a perfect cover drive except its straight to Symonds in the covers
a single now, as Pathan pushes it wide of Symonds and calls for the one
good length, pushed across Tendulkar, who feels for it and gets beaten
hello, thats huge! Pathan comes down and clouts Hogg across the line and against the spin, timing it perfectly and picking up a massive six over wide long-on
tossed up on a good length, outside off, Pathan comes forward and opens the face, steering it to backward point
tossed up fuller on off stump, he gets well forward and defends it back
fuller and straighter, the ball holding its line, Pathan again gets a good stride in and plays it back watchfully
tossed up beautifully, pitches and goes on down leg stump, Pathan is caught on the front pad and that excites Hogg and Gilchrist, but umpire Dar reckons it was missing leg
a fraction shorter outside off, enticing Pathan to cut but he's cramped and misses
back of a length on middle and leg, he shuffles and clips it through square leg
overpitched outside off and Pathan finds the gap between cover and point with a nice little front-foot steer
good length, straight and with no room, Tendulkar gets forward and defends
nice shot, though it was overpitched and asking to be driven, and Tendulkar does so with a perfect shot through extra cover
full again and he goes for the drive, but straight to Symonds this time
good length, pushed into the covers and its that man Symonds again, collecting and throwing back to Gilchrist
looped up well, on middle and off, Pathan drives back to Hogg
short and wide, not much turn, cut to Clarke at backward point
tossed up very well on off stump, forcing Pathan to come forward and defend
tossed up on that inviting length, asking him to drive but Pathan defends
lovely flight again on that same length, Pathan defends and Gilchrist appeals, Im just not sure for what
served up a touch fuller, allowing Pathan to square-drive and pick up a single
back of a length outside off stump, defended to cover watchfully
back of a length but much wider, Pathan leaves and the umpire does his job
overpitched outside off, Pathan eases forward and drives well into the covers, where Hogg runs across from mid-off and fields
back of a length on off stump, turned with the wrists into the midwicket area
back of a length outside off, left alone as its a bit wide
full and wide, Pathan reaches for it and gets an edge which bounces before Hayden at a pretty wide slip
now he greets the half-volley with a drive out to Hodge in the deep for one
lovely! Big turn from Hogg, pitching one just outside off and beating Pathan as he comes forward
straighter delivery, Pathan strides well forward and smothers the spin
tossed up outside off, Pathan leans forward and drives to cover
first poor ball he's bowled, short on off stump, Pathan pulls out to the deep for one ... the ball didnt come on as well as he'd have liked
serves up a low full toss, which Tendulkar steps out to and drives to Lee at mid-off
full outside off stump, driven with too much bottom-hand past Ponting and point moves in to field it
short-pitched delivery on off stump, forcing Tendulkar up on the toes, defending in front of point
good length on off stump, pushed softly into the covers
angled outside leg stump, Tendulkar simply eases that off the pads into the gap behind square for another single to try and keep matters ticking along
slow delivery, overpitched, Pathan drives to cover, languidly
good length, defended into the covers, thoughts of a single are squashed as the fielders move sharply
good length outside off again, this time he places his push wide enough of the fielders and Pathan calls for the single that'll get him back on strike
tossed up gently on a length, Pathan again strides forward and defends, getting an inside-edge to leg
short delivery, lands and spins away from Pathan, whos almost beaten into the shot but manages to poke it back to Hogg
slower delivery, nicely floated up on a length, Pathan steers it to point
tossed up down leg, big stride from Pathan negates any turn
out the back of the hand, Pathan sees it and drives past mid-off for one
flatter trajectory from Hogg, drifting onto leg stump, Tendulkar tucks it off the pads and picks up one to short fine leg
full outside off, Tendulkar's into a loose drive with little footwork and beaten
full again, pitching and moving away, Tendulkar shoulders arms

edged and gone! A Lee special, the best ball he's bowled today, pitching on a good length and sucking Tendulkar forward into the straight drive, then deviating and drawing the outside edge which Gilchrist gleefully snaps up! The bowling changes works perfectly and Tendulkar goes for 47
easy pickings first ball, Harbhajan clipping a delivery on leg stump down to fine leg for four
good shot, Harbhajan taking the half-volley nicely, with decent footwork, and driving on the up out to cover sweeper
good length delivery, Pathan comes forward and drives between cover and point for a crucial single off the last ball
floated up on off stump, pushed straigtht into the covers
flatter delivery, quicker too, pitching on a shorter length and spinning away as Pathan pokes at it and snicks it just past Gilchrist and down to third man
tossed up full on leg stump, Pathan flicks through midwicket nicely and some excellent running gets him two
fuller and straighter, he comes forward and defends
tossed up a touch wider and Pathan flays the drive out to cover sweeper

and Hogg wins that easy battle! A needless, reckless shot from Harbhajan, not even waiting to see what Hogg's got to offer, instead preferring to slog down the ground, miscuing it and giving mid-off, running back a little, a simple catch
good length, on off stump, he gets back and defends it
too full and swinging down leg stump, Kartik tries the flick but collects it on the boot, the ball rolling to short fine leg
slower ball, full on off stump, flicked across the line to midwicket
and thats four for Johnson! Simple dismissal, the ball pitching on a good length, moving away ever so slightly, drawing the thick outside edge off the bat and Gilchrist takes it easily
drifts down leg stump, Zaheer opens his account first ball, like Harbhajan, with a nudge off the pads
quick, short, and Kartik stands in his crease and goes fishing
tossed up gently, Zaheer comes forward tentatively and defends across the front pad
straighter one, goes past Zaheer's bat this time and Gilchrist whips off the bails
tossed up fuller, Zaheer comes out and defends it
flatter and shorter, spinning across Zaheer, who leaves it alone
good bowling, pitching on a good length and spinning past the bat
fuller this time, he comes out and defends to point
maiden five-for for Johnson, a special moment! Steams in, bangs it in on a short length and forces Kartik to hop up and steer it into Gilchrist's safe gloves! India nine down!
full and swinging outside off, RP chops the bat down and misses it
back of a length, down the legs, he plays at if falling over and the ball rolls to square leg
full length outside off, RP stands and drives it back down the ground, Johnson gets a hand on it and saves runs
short-pitched delivery, RP stands tall and opens the face, the ball runs wide of second slip and down to third man for a single
wide ball, very wide outside leg stump and theres poor carry to Gilchrist
good length outside off stump, he gets behind the line and defends to point
full and going down leg stump, RP tries the flick and is beaten by the slowness, looping it up to the offside, but safely
welcome runs, as this time RP connects perfectly with the flick to the yorker and gets it past midwicket
short delivery outside off stump, RP hops up and defends to point
another attempted yorker, swinging and all, he goes for the drive and it flies to midwicket
good length, slower delivery, RP drives with little footwork and inside-edges it to the leg side, Lee runs around and fields but thats one anyway
a bit of width now and its chopped well through point for one out to the deep
good length outside off stump, he stands and drives uneasily back down the track
back of a length, pushed to Clarke at point as the field moves in for the kill
back of a length, more room this time, and Zaheer steers it through the gap at gully for a single down to third man
heave ho! RP swings everything he's possibly got at this wide delivery, swinging around in his crease, but cant connect
bouncer! Banged in over leg stump, forcing RP to duck out of the way, though he took his eyes all off that one
slower ball, full on middle and off and RP does well to pick it and keep it out
back of a length outside off, well driven through the covers and Zaheer wants the second, but RP wisely sends him back
overpitched outside off, RP leans down and steers it past point for one more
good length, tidy delivery marginally outside off stump, which Zaheer watchfully defends to point
short-pitched from Lee now, on off stump, and he gets up to play it down safely, getting right behind the line of the ball
its the slower delivery this time, out the back of Lee's hands, full too, and Zaheer gets to the pitch to drive into the covers for one
yorker honed in on leg stump, RP just gets bat down on it to survive
short delivery banged in outside off stump and Zaheer gets up on the toes, uppercutting safely down to Lee at third man, on the bounce
back of a length on middle and leg, he gets behind it and tucks it to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, played off the back foot into the covers for one
good length this time, Zaheer comes onto the front foot and plays it to point
short of a length on leg stump, Zaheer jumps up and tucks it past square leg
goes for the yorker but its well outside off and RP drives it back
overpitched from Lee and Zaheer comes forward to drive out to deep cover, a confident shout from the tailender, something lacking from his team-mates up the order
good length this time, coming in slightly, Zaheer gets behind it and defends
slower ball, almost a yorker on leg stump, Zaheer shuffles across dangerously and tucks it through the vacant space at midwicket for two ... and he's the third Indian batsman into double figures
yorker length on off stump, well picked and played to point by Zaheer
even slower this time, another yorker on the stumps, Zaheer is close to being beaten by the pace, standing outside leg stump, but gets bat on it
Lee bends his back on the last delivery, banging it in short outside off and Zaheer arches his back and holds the bat back to allow it pass .. and thats a front-foot no ball, so we have a free hit
backs away, Lee bowls it short and wide and Zaheer thumps it over mid-off's head, the ball lands safely but some indecisive running from the batsmen gets them just two
good length ball, driven into the covers well, Hodge collects, more mayhem between the batsmen but Zaheer is just home safe
slower ball, good length, picked and driven to extra cover by Zaheer
short of a length outside off, Zaheer stands and fishes and gets beaten
crucial runs! Zaheer backs away and slogs a slower ball from Bracken one-handed across the line and the ball sails over mid-on and into the stands
much fuller this time, just outside off stump, and Zaheer digs it out to point
much shorter this time, Zaheer gets up on the tip-toes and then as the ball crosses him tries the uppercut, only to get beaten by the bounce
tossed up outside off, no real spin, RP defends off the front foot
short and flat on middle and leg, RP swats is safely down to long-on
tossed up outside off, its the googly, and beats Zaheer as he lunges forward
shorter delivery, Zaheer goes back and defends watchfully
well flighted on an off-stump line, Zaheer comes forward and smothers the spin
quicker delivery, outside the line of impact, catches Zaheer with a pretty big stride forward ... half an appeal from Hogg but thats not going to be given out
with the angle, a yorker swings in past leg stump and beats RP as he drives expansively ... Bracken smiles, wryly
attempted yorker goes full, RP walks across the stumps and flicks it straight to midwicket
slower ball, yorker but well down leg stump, RP picks it away past square leg
full outside off stump, Zaheer drives in the air over mid-off's head and luckily for him the ball lands safely
full in the blockhole, well dug out back to Bracken
another attempted yorker on the stumps is played to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he leaves it be
half a dozen! Zaheer judges the length and clears the front leg, heaving across the line and picking his spot excellently, thats the cleanest hit today
quicker delivery now, just outside off, beats Zaheer this time
loops up the wrong 'un excellently, sucking him into the drive and beating the bat
now Zaheer takes it from middle and off and paddles it fine for two, top shot
full and flat on leg stump, tucked around the corner but cant beat the fielder
full on off stump, swinging in, he tries to work it fine but survives with an inside-edge back onto the boot
full outside off stump this time, RP nicely runs it wide of point for one
now its the offcutter, which he comes forward to and defends
and thats the end of that! An enterprising stand of 41 is snapped by Bracken as Zaheer drives a full delivery and gets a thin edge into Gilchrist's gloves, his sixth catch today

inn2.comm: tossed up on a good length, Gilchrist taps it back defensively
pitches on leg and spins away, Gilchrist tucks it backward of square for two
pushed across Gilchrist and it spins a good way as he watches it be
tossed up on an inviting length, spins and bounces as Gilchrist defends it
tossed up again on that length, tentatively defended by Gilchrist
good ball, pitching on length, then gripping and turning as Gilchrist initially plays at it but withdraws the bat
and he begins with one slanted down leg, a freebie for Hayden to open his account, and he does so well, clipping it away to fine leg
and again, angled down leg stump but for one this time, as Hayden clips it squarer and deep backward square leg fields it
back of a length outside off stump, Gilchrist stands tall and pushes away from the body into the point region, where Yuvraj reacts well and fields
full delivery outside off, Gilchrist goes for the expansive drive and gets an inside-edge out to deep backward square leg where Harbhajan fields
back of a length, driven off the back foot into the covers where Uthappa fumbles but mid-off is quick to tidy up
width outside off stump and even though it comes off the toe end of the bat its in the gap and speeding away for four
tossed up on leg stump, turned wide of square leg for one and Dhoni fields
tossed up on a length, good turn from Harbhajan but Hayden gets a stride in and leaves, wasnt that far from off stump however
pushed through quicker, Hayden plants the front foot out and tries to sweep against the spin, but the ball spins past him
some width now to Hayden, who slaps it into the covers for one
tossed up outside off stump, Gilchrist comes forward and drives back to the bowler
flatter delivery on leg stump, tucked to midwicket
good length delivery outside off stump, uneasily and uppishly steered towards point, where a misfield from Yuvraj allows the single
back of a length delivery, coming in with the arm, Gilchrist gets right behind the line and defends to point
back of a length, coming in from middle and off, Gilchirst plays it to midwicket
tight bowling, again back of a length outside off stump and moving in, Gilchrist shuffles across and defends watchfully
all timing and placement, as Gilchrist again gets behind the line but uses the extra room to push it superbly between cover and mid-off
beaten! Short of a length outside off stump, forcing Gilchrist to have a waft
tossed up and getting it to spin across Hayden, who shoulders arms
again pushed across, he's confident leaving it outside off, as it spins by
yep, he's in trouble, planting the leg out and trying to sweep across the line but gets beaten as Harbhajan varies the pace
tossed up on a length, Hayden reaches out and drives uneasily to cover, where Yuvraj dives and fires in a wayward through back to Harbhajan, repriving Hayden's runner
tossed up outside leg stump, Gilchrist tries to sweep but misses
tossed up on leg stump, spins across him sharply and he's squared up, the ball clipping his pads and into Dravid's hands at slip
back of a length on middle and leg, driven to mid-on and they take on Pathan's arm, but its a wide throw back in
back of a length outside off this time, carefully defended off the back foot
short on off stump, stays low as Gilchrist mistimes his attempted pull into the ground for midwicket to give chase and field
short of a length and wide, Gilchrist comes across to off and glides it safely down to third man for another single
thats how he's going to play! Already a foot out of his crease, Hayden steps down nonchalantly and drills a good length delivery back down to long-on
full and wide and Hayden gets down onto bended knee, square-driving,  but he cant beat backward point
tossed up outside leg stump, tucked fine but to the fielder, no chance of a run
pushed across the left-hander, who judges it and leaves outside off stump
quicker and flatter on middle and off, he shuffles and works it into the gap at square leg for one
flatter and wider, but good spin, as Hayden ignores it outside off stump
tossed up outside off stump, pushed into the point region
tossed up on a length, he comes forward and drives to cover
tossed up full outside off, Gilchrist comes forward and pushes it back
quicker one, full still, Gilchrist gets back and plays it to Kartik as a puff of dust kicks up
thats the straighter one that goes on, beating Gilchrist as he plays for turn
another quick and flat delivery beats Gilchrist as he's clueless outside off stump
arm ball again, pushed through well, Gilchrist gets forward and defends back to Kartik
tossed up invitingly and Gilchrist again plays it back to complete a maiden over
tossed up outside leg, it spins across Hayden and he's again beaten trying that sweep against the spin ... his cramps giving him trouble
short and wide, he gets back but cant beat Uthappa in the covers
floated up teasingly on off stump, Hayden drives back to the bowler
flatter trajectory on off stump, flicked across the line to square leg
short delivery on off stump, he gets back and pulls out to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he gets a stride in and drives into the covers
short on off stump, he gets back and flicks it into the gap at midwicket and Yuvraj moves around from square leg to field
close! Gilchrist dances down and Kartik alters the line, Gilchrist is beaten in the flight but goes over mid-off's head, but since Zaheer is back he cant jump up and get to it
quicker delivery on middle and off, tucked away for one
tossed up outside off, he comes out and plays it back to Kartik
tossed up wide again, Hayden tries to sweep but misses
short and flat, pushed off the back foot into the covers
tossed up outside off stump, Hayden waits on the back foot and watches it spin past him
hit off the back foot towards cover
pushed to long-on for  a single
tossed up outside off stump from round the wicket, the ball pitches and spins away from Gilchrist who lets it go
a touch short and wide outside off, Gilchrist cuts off the back foot to point
this time Gilchrist moves quickly on to the back foot and pulls the ball straight down the ground for four
played through midwicket off the back foot
Gilchrist moves back in his crease and works the ball off his hips behind square
defended off the back foot towards square leg
flighted delivery outside off stump, Hayden leans forward and defends
bowled flat on off and middle stump, Hayden waits on the back foot and pushes the ball to mid-on
starts off with one that is too straight, Gilchrist moves towards the off and whips it off his pads for one
pushed off the back foot towards midwicket
once again he pitches on off and slants the ball into the pads, Hayden plays the ball in front of the man at short fine leg
fired down leg side this time, wide called
appalling fielding, Sachin Tendulkar lets an on-drive go through his legs at mid-on for four, shoddy stuff

bowled him! Hayden walks down the pitch and tries to hit down the ground, the angle into him induces the inside edge and the ball crashes into the stumps, India have the breakthrough but they need several more if they are to make a fight of this
full ball on the pads, Ponting moves across his stumps and flicks uppishly through the vacant square leg region
flighted delivery on off stump, driven off the front foot to mid off
Gilchrist gets down on one knee and sweeps Karthik from middle stump, there are shouts of 'catch' but the only people who could catch that are sitting in the stands at deep square leg
beaten by the straight one outside off, Dhoni whips off the bails but Gilchrist is safe
defended off the front foot to mid-off
and again! Gilchrist steps down the pitch and lofts Kartik cleanly over the long-on boundary, crisp strike
that's the third one that's cleared the boundary in the over, Gilchrist gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it straight back over the bowler's head, lovely clean hitting
full ball outside the off stump, Ponting leans forward and drives to cover
full length once again on off stump, Ponting leans forward but checks his drive and pushes the ball to mid-off
slower ball on middle and leg stump, pushed off the pads to mid-on
good length delivery slants sharply into Gilchrist who gets hit on the pad as he comes forward and tries to flick across the line, RP Singh appeals for leg before but that was missing leg
nudged off the pads behind square for one
drifting down leg side and Gilchrist moves across and nudges it down to the fine leg boundary
back of a length outside off stump, Ponting gets behind and defends
short on the stumps, Ponting gets into shape and pulls out to the fielder in the deep
back of a length outside off, Gilchrist content to play it back to Pathan
slower ball, change of pace, good length outside off stump and Gilchrist, coming forward tentatively, guides it to backward point
overpitched on leg stump, with the field spread defensively Gilchrist can ease that  into the vacant midwicket area and get an easy single
back of a length outside off, Ponting has no hassles opening the face and steering it down to third man for one more
a poor ball, looped up legspinner very full and wide and Ponting tonks it through the covers for four
better delivery, well flighted on off stump and Ponting waits for it to turn before pushing to cover
decent delivery, tossed up outside off stump and forcing Ponting to reach out, and he picks the gap at cover-point for one
fuller and straighter, Gilchrist drives it back to Tendulkar
tossed up down leg stump, spins away and Gilchrist tucks it fine for one
tossed up on off stump, spins into Ponting, who on-drives down the ground
slow delivery, on a length outside off stump, defended to point
a bit wider this time but Ponting cant time his back-foot cut well, too much bottom hand on the shot as he clubs into the ground
short, wide and rising but Ponting gets over it, dropping the wrists and placing it through a diving Yuvraj at backward point and no one can stop that
good length delivery on leg stump, tucked wide of square leg for a brace
overpitched outside off stump, Ponting straight-drives back past Pathan and mid-off scampers across to field
fullish outside off stump, he drives with bottom hand and gets an inside-edge to midwicket, but is sharp and calls for the quick single, moving to 49
flat outside off, spinning away, Gilchrist swats that into midwicket to raise his first half-century of the Future Cup
fizzed up invitingly, Ponting leans forward and drives into the covers
tossed up outside leg, spins in and he taps it to the fielder
fuller delivery down leg stump, Gilchrist gets down and sweeps, the ball clips his bat, then boot and runs to fine leg
flighted outside off stump, Ponting uses his feet and drives to extra cover for one
quicker, straighter delivery on off stump hurries Gilchrist into his shot, ends up playing it back to Tendulkar
tossed up from around the stumps, pitches on leg and Ponting tucks it to square leg for a cool single
tossed up invitingly, Gilchrist gets forward and pushes into the covers for one more
teasing line, tossed up nicely and getting Ponting forward to push it back to cover
looped up down leg stump, Ponting gets a huge stride in and takes it on the pad
tight delivery, Kartik using the angle and landing it on the right spot, getting it to spin away as Ponting comes forward and blocks
again Ponting has to get well forward and choke the spin from Kartik, who's bowled a good over on return
tossed up full on off stump, defended to cover by Gilchrist
fired down leg stump and Gilchrist sweeps out to deep backward square
tossed up full and Ponting uses the feet, coming out and flicking to mid-on
tossed up outside leg, spins a long way as Gilchrist strides forward, catching him outside the line ... a meek appeal from the bowler

bang, thats six! Gilchrist sees the tossed up delivery on middle and leg and heaves against the spin, with a big stride forward, and sends it up on top of the shamiana behind deep midwicket ... fiesty blow ... the ball's gone
pushed through well outside leg stump, way outside the line, catches Gilchrists pad and Harbhajan and Dhoni appeal shamelessly ... how can that be out?
tossed up down leg stump, Ponting gets forward and paddles it away for four
tossed up on a length, Ponting gets forward and defends to point
sharp turn! Fizzed up, it pitches and grips off the pitch, the bounce beating Ponting and Dhoni but Dravid collects it at slip
fullish down leg stump, easily turned fine into the gap behind square
short and spinning into him, he makes room and pulls out to deep midwicket
tossed up gently on leg stump, Ponting plays out in front of his pad and gets one more into the midwicket region, good calling and running
tossed up outside off, Ponting comes out and drives to cover
fuller and flatter, middle and off, defended to cover again
tossed up outside off stump, Ponting watchfully defends to cover
quicker delivery, flat on middle and off, Ponting uses the feet and flicks out to deep midwicket for two
pushed through on a length, forcing Ponting back and he defends it to short leg
a touch wide of off stump and Ponting shapes up to cut, but he's cramped and misses ... oohs and aahs all round
short ball, pulled out to deep midwicket for four
short on the stumps, pulled out to deep midwicket, Ganguly fields
short ball again, this time he works it to the fielder at midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, Gilchrist leaves it alone
tossed up nicely on a length, spins back into Gilchrist who defends it easily
quicker ball, pushed through and Gilchrist drives to RP at backward point
tossed up on middle and off, Ponting dances down and drives out to long-on
comes out initially, Harbhajan changes the length, then Gilchrist waits on it and turns it into the gap at midwicket
tossed up again on middle and off Ponting easily drives back down the ground
flighted from around the stumps, Gilchrist sweeps from outside off out to midwicket
short and wide, he uses the room to punch that through the covers and no one can chase that down ... India limp
now its tossed up down leg, and Ponting sweeps easily into the gap for four more
tossed up outside off stump and Gilchrist just clouts that up and over midwicket for four more .. effortless batting from him right now
and again he sweeps from outside off, not timed well but the top-edge lands well in front of Harbhajan running around from fine leg
quicker ball, flatter line and length, Gilchrist goes back and plays it back to Kartik
a shot away from victory, as Gilchrist comes out and drills a full delivery back past Kartik's hand, and its screams away for four
and Australia go up 3-1 in the Future Cup as Gilchrist rounds off his outstanding day in the field by tucking one into the gap at midwicket for one
